fileExtension.title: #File extension
fileExtension.description: The file extension used to retrieve Open Street Map data

maximumLevel.title: #Maximum level
maximumLevel.description: The maximum tile level to retrieve from Open Street Map data

attribution.title: #Attribution
attribution.description: The attribution to display with the data

subdomains.title: #Subdomains
subdomains.description: The array of subdomains, one of which will be prepended to each tile URL.

description: A {@link ImageryLayerCatalogItem} representing a layer from the Open Street Map server.
title: Open Street Map
